DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate impact supervised 12-week high-intensity aerobic interval exercise program ( versus self-directed exercise usual care group ) establish novel surrogate marker cardiovascular health population-based sample testicular cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: High-intensity Aerobic Interval Training Testicular Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: histologically confirm history testicular cancer Not sufficiently ambulatory complete first two stage aerobic exercise test . Have psychiatric condition impairs ability perform require volume intensity exercise . Have uncontrolled cardiovascular condition ( i.e . heart disease , hypertension , diabetes , arrhythmia ) . Report perform weekly vigorous intensity aerobic exercise past month .
